properties.name: Denton, Texas (Home Base)
properties.description: Starting and ending point of the Raptor Assault road trip.

properties.name: Amarillo, Texas
properties.description: Panhandle city along US-287 with wide open skies and plains.

properties.name: Raton Pass Viewpoint
properties.description: High mountain pass at the Colorado–New Mexico border marking the first entrance into the Rockies.

properties.name: Element Colorado Springs Downtown
properties.description: First night in Colorado Springs; rooftop restaurant and bar with 220° view over the city and mountains where a storm rolled in from the Front Range.

properties.name: Buena Vista, Colorado
properties.description: Valley town along the Arkansas River and launching point for the climb toward Independence Pass.

properties.name: Independence Pass & Continental Divide
properties.description: High alpine pass at 12,095 feet crossing the Continental Divide with clear weather and dramatic views.

properties.name: Aspen, Colorado
properties.description: Quiet resort town in a high valley, visited out of tourist season with very little noise or traffic.

properties.name: Vail, Colorado
properties.description: Alpine-style village with European architecture and peaceful mountain setting along I-70.

properties.name: Grand Junction, Colorado
properties.description: Western Colorado city marking the transition from high Rockies toward Utah canyon country.

properties.name: Le Méridien Salt Lake City Downtown
properties.description: Downtown Salt Lake City hotel with rooftop views over the city grid and Wasatch Front.

properties.name: Ford Raptor Assault School (Utah Motorsports Campus)
properties.description: Location of the Ford Performance Raptor Assault driving program with desert runs, rock crawling, and technical hill exercises.

properties.name: Wyoming High Plains Overlook (near Casper)
properties.description: Rainy, windswept high plains landscape that felt like the Scottish Highlands, with rolling hills and almost no visible human development.

properties.name: Hotel Polaris – U.S. Air Force Academy
properties.description: Hotel overlooking the U.S. Air Force Academy with panoramic views of the Front Range and academy grounds.
